text: Yu Dong-ju (; born August 19, 1993) is a South Korean male weightlifter, competing in the 85 kg category and representing South Korea at international competitions. He participated in the men's 85 kg event at the 2015 World Championships and at the 2016 Summer Olympics, finishing in fourteenth position. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 85 kg ||151||157|| ~~161~~ ||15||193||198|| ~~200~~ ||9||355||11 |} ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Weightlifters at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic weightlifters of South Korea
